Token.Abstract: SKScene category methods for Kobold Kit
Enumerates all physics bodies in the world by passing an INFINITY rect to enumerateBodiesInRect.

Parameter.Name: block
Parameter.Abstract: The block that is called for every physics body.

Token.Abstract: Receiver observes notifications posted by notification center.

Parameter.Name: notificationName
Parameter.Abstract: A string uniquely identifying the notification.

Parameter.Name: notificationSelector
Parameter.Abstract: The selector that is performed when a matching notification was received. Selector takes a single NSNotification object as parameter.

Token.Abstract: Receiver observes notifications posted by notification center but only those notifications posted by a specific object.

Parameter.Name: notificationName
Parameter.Abstract: A string uniquely identifying the notification.

Parameter.Name: notificationSelector
Parameter.Abstract: The selector that is performed when a matching notification was received. Selector takes a single NSNotification object as parameter.

Parameter.Name: notificationSender
Parameter.Abstract: The notification sender object whose notifications are observed.

Token.Abstract: Receiver disregards all notifications with the given name.

Parameter.Name: notificationName
Parameter.Abstract: A string uniquely identifying the notification.

Token.Abstract: Receiver disregards notifications with the given name coming from a specific object.

Parameter.Name: notificationName
Parameter.Abstract: A string uniquely identifying the notification.

Parameter.Name: notificationSender
Parameter.Abstract: The notification sender object whose notifications are observed.

Token.Abstract: Receiver disregards any and all notification sent by the notification center.
